short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It helps to encode or decode the dragged text to base64

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are many sites that encode a string to base64 or decode the base64 code. These sites offer more complex and detailed functions, but they are generally not required.

This program really simply encodes or decodes text dragged from a web page into base64 immediately. The converted content can be viewed by the user by clicking the extension icon and provides easy copying through the copy button.

How to use:
1. Mouse right-click conversion
  a. Drag the text you want to convert.
  b. Right-click and click the "Base64 Converter" item.
  c. Click on what you need between "encode" and "decode".
  d. The results are displayed in the confirmation window.
2. Conversion via popup page
  a. Drag the text you want to convert.
  b. Click the extension icon to open a popup page.
  c. The results are displayed on the popup page.
3. Manual conversion via pop-up page
  a. Click the extension icon to open a popup page.
  b. Write or paste the text you want to convert in the "Selected Text" text box.
  c. Click the "Convert" button.
  d. The results are displayed on the popup page.
